title: Add /coderef-sources Route - Knowledge Base for Agentic Team
description: Create centralized knowledge base route displaying internal and external sources: standards, guides, documentation, references for agentic team with categorized links and searchable interface

context.motivation: Provide agentic team unified access to all standards, guides, and reference materials. Eliminate scattered documentation and create single source of truth for team resources.
context.problem_statement:
Team members lack centralized knowledge base:
- Standards scattered across multiple locations
- No unified search across guides
- Unclear which docs are current vs. deprecated
- No distinction between internal (project) and external (framework/library) resources
- No categorization or tagging system
- Manual tracking of reference links
requirements: Create /coderef-sources route in Next.js app directory
Build categorized source library with sections: Internal, External
Implement source categories: Standards, Guides, API References, Architecture, Patterns, Tools, Frameworks
Display sources as linked cards (title, description, category, link, last_updated)
Add search functionality across all sources
Add filter by category (Standards, Guides, etc.)
Add filter by source type (Internal, External)
Display source metadata: last_updated, category, access_level, owner
Integrate with existing dashboard theme, sidebar, header
Persist user preferences (favorites, filters) to localStorage

features.search: Real-time search across title, description, tags
features.metadata_display: Last updated, owner, access level, tag badges
features.open_external: Open source in new tab with tracking

data_sources: Internal: Local sources.json file with curated list
Internal: Scan project documentation files (.md, config files)
integration_points: Reuse existing Dashboard Sidebar (add Sources nav item)
Reuse existing search patterns from Prompts page
Integrate with documentation-site (link to full docs)
success_criteria: Search finds sources by title, description, tags within 500ms
Internal vs. External sources clearly distinguished
All broken links identified and highlighted
Team adopts as reference during development
